abilitygroupdescription.p: These abilities represent training in the use of spears, halberds, bill hooks, glaives and other pole-arms in combat. Spears and Polearms can also use Staff abilities.

abilitydescription.p: Characters equipped with a polearm, but not a spear, can use the hooked edge of this weapon to attempt to disarm an opponent or remove their shield.
If the character successfuly hits the attacker makes an opposed Strength test against the opponent. If successful the defender drops their weapon/shield.
Characters equipped with a spear or polearm can strike with it during combat doing weapon damage.

Characters equipped with a spear or polearm can brace against a charge striking first and doing extra damage. To use this the attack must be directed at an opponent that is Charging in the direction of the character.

The character swings their weapon in large arcs keeping foes at bay. Opponents must make a Mettle Check with DDC 10+Level the first time they declare a melee attack on a character, if they fail their attack fails. In addition, the character may make a Spear Strike counter attack as a reaction against the first opponent that tries to strike them.
Note that this ability requires a reasonable amount of space to swing the weapon, and it only works when the opponents are within a 180Â° arc.
